overview:
Rahul Mewawalla is an executive and investor with leadership experience at Fortune 500 and high growth companies such as Nokia, NBCUniversal / General Electric Company, Yahoo! and Monitor Group.

His responsibilities have been strategic and operational across general management, global business unit leadership, business growth and transformation, corporate development, strategy, mergers and acquisitions, and operations. He has built and managed top-tier global organizations and teams across the Americas, Europe and Asia-Pacific.

He has been a speaker and judge at institutions such as Harvard, Stanford, MIT, Wharton, Yale, University of California, and at events such as the Red Herring CEO Conference, Harvard Center for Enterprise and the MIT-Stanford Lab.

Rahul has an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University. He has also been involved with non-profit organizations such as the Yale-Goldman Sachs Foundation.
